Changelog
============

1.0a
------------
* Implemented Dagroup with dask arrays
* Added abstract class to manage drivers and groups
* Added driver Zarr
* Added driver Postgres
* Added driver Sqlite3
* Added driver HDF5
* Added driver CSV


0.1.1
------------
* Implemented basic cross validator
* Implemented basic abstract class to manage keras, sklearn, lightGBM and xgboost
* Implemented iterators
* Testing dask with drivers
* Implemented basic dama-cli to manage datasets and models

0.1.0
------------
* Initial version
